definition: decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.chinese: 豐富的馬籠頭皮革飾邊。

sentences.english: Made of printed synthetic fabric with synthetic leather trim.
sentences.chinese: 印有合成皮革飾邊的化纖面料製成的。

sentences.english: She sewed a frill on the bottom of her skirt.
sentences.chinese: 她在她的裙子下邊縫上飾邊。

sentences.english: The Olympic flag has a plain white background with no border.
sentences.chinese: 奧林匹克旗幟底色是白色，沒有飾邊。

sentences.english: She described it as red with pink frills .
sentences.chinese: 她將之描述爲紅色帶有粉紅色飾邊。

sentences.english: Fixed hood with removable faux fur trim.
sentences.chinese: 固定罩可拆卸人造毛皮飾邊。
